original_title: 石和温泉で見つけたお嬢さん タオル一枚男湯入ってみませんか？ スペシャル！！
overview: Six amateur ladies who challenge numerous missions to win prizes in men's baths that are embarrassing just to enter. This time, 50 instigators create a whirlwind of shame! The appearance of being bathed in countless semen while washing the head is a must-see! Can the ladies who blush at the male genitals that are dizzying wherever they look be able to carry out their missions!? ? (smile)
title: Shall the Beautiful Girl Enter the Men's Side of the Isawa Bath House with Just a Towel? Special Edition !
